meanings.definition: A member of an ancient Roman priesthood responsible for conducting rituals related to declaring war and making treaties.
meanings.sent1: The fetiales performed important ceremonies in ancient Rome.
meanings.sent2: The fetiales were crucial in maintaining peace and declaring war.
meanings.sent3: The fetiales accidentally spilled the ceremonial wine during a treaty negotiation.
meanings.sent4: The role of the fetiales in Roman society was as solemn as the beating of a war drum.
meanings.sent5: The image of the fetiales in their traditional attire is etched in history books.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the fetiales.
meanings.sent1: The historian studied the fetiales customs in detail.
meanings.sent2: The fetiales rituals were deeply ingrained in Roman culture.
meanings.sent3: The fetiales-inspired decorations added a unique touch to the event.
meanings.sent4: The bond between the two nations was as strong as the fetiales traditions.
meanings.sent5: The fetiales influence could be seen in the diplomatic practices of the time.
